bio.title: Building Reliable, Scalable Web Systems
bio.p1: I’m Maximiliano Torres, a Full-Stack Developer based in Southeast Asia, specializing in building production-ready web applications with React and Next.js. Since 2017, I’ve been creating tools and systems that prioritize clean architecture, performance, and maintainability.
bio.p2: I design and develop digital solutions that automate workflows, manage complex data, and support business growth — from internal dashboards to full web platforms. My focus is delivering reliable systems that solve real operational challenges.
bio.p3: In addition to development, I have experience teaching IT and Web Design at different Universities in China and Laos. I collaborate with international clients and remote teams, ensuring consistent delivery and long-term success.
